attributes.action: The influx Immigration needs to stop and stop now.
attributes.additional_details: Flooding again this year in parts of Britain, you find money to house and fund refugees, it's about time the government took note of us the tax payer and don't squander our money, build better water defences, fund the British public, more money to the NHS, schools, ambulance service, armed forces, housing for us, if you can find money to fund others you can use this money to fund the United Kingdom. Build our inferstructure make us great, stop the unwanted coming here. Act now before we lose everything
attributes.background: With the recent floods again this November and December, the government need to look to us the British people, and not worry what the rest of the world think, immigration as to take a back step and look after our futures and our children's by adding more to our forever failing inferstructure.

rejection.details:
If you would like immigration to be stopped completely, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106477
